p: Next, I think it is also essential to train KMD public health professionals and strengthen the competence and professionalize the KM community. In terms of upbringing KMD public health professionals, I hope that the number of professionals in preventive KM increases. Also, they should be allowed to work as epidemiological investigators by law, which I will mention again in part about regulations. I also think that education on infectious diseases should be added and reinforced for KMDs serving the army in the public health centers.
